message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this fantastic product. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you.  Given its benefits, I'm offering it for $11,500.  What do you think?
I'm very interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,500. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at that price?
Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While I understand your offer, I'm confident this product is worth more than that, especially given its value to you. How about we settle at $11,000?
I really like the product, but I'm trying to be mindful of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $10,500, but I was thinking more along the lines of $10,000. Would you be willing to meet me at $10,000?
